title: Trainspotting
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: Ah pass ma auld Montgomery Street gaff, then the former junk zone of Albert Street, now sandblasted and tarted up. A polis car frantically lets rip on the siren as it hurtles doon the Walk.

title: Skagboys
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: 524same desolate skag reek of Albert Street. — What are we daein here?

title: Skagboys
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: No, it has not. Because one thing ah mind ay clearly is a certain addressin Albert Street, and the seven digits ay a phone number gied tae us bySeeker. Ah move across tae Hazel n pit my airm around her slender waist.

title: Diary, sketches and reviews,
author: Dodge, Robert. [from old catalog]
snippet: Returned to Windsor ; lunched at the Castle Inn, and took rails home. Called in the evening at Albert Street and Gordon Square.
